name: Noah (tomtown97)
description:
Noah is a narrative game that combines different flood myths from Genesis (the Hebrew Bible and the Christian Old Testament) and Huainanzi (an ancient Chinese text).

The game starts with the players going to the Noah Ark, then making the decision between saving the rest of the creatures on earth with Nuwa, the goddess from China, or sleeping until the flood ends.

Made By: Yantao Tang

From UAL MA Games Design

----------------------

Currently, it only has the English language available.
